events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but unfortunately I need to return it and get a refund as it doesn't fit me at all.
The reported issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster since the customer requests a return and money back.
The refund request case has been assigned to agent Lisa M. for further assistance and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return the jacket and get a refund. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or washed? This will help us process your refund properly.
Sure, my order number is 5483921. The jacket is brand new and hasn’t been worn or washed yet.
Thank you for the information. You can return the jacket using our prepaid return label. Once we receive it, we will process a full refund within 5 business days.
That sounds great. I appreciate how easy this process seems. I will send the jacket back today using the return label.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3 to 5 days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and to see if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I got the refund today. Thanks for your help. Everything was handled very professionally!
Closing this case now as the refund has been successfully processed and the customer confirmed receipt. Thank you.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to the customer’s email to collect feedback about their support experience.
